ip_reveal.popups package¶

Module contents¶

ip_reveal.popups.ip_change_notify(old, new)[source]¶

Play and alert sound and produce a notification in the center of the screen alerting the user that their external IP address has changed

Parameters

  • old (str) – The old IP Address, as recorded

  • new (str) – The new IP Address that the machine now has, as recorded

Returns

None
